item.title: mp3split: a simple shell script for splitting mp3 audio files
item.description: Introduction Downloading mp3 files these days or converting a music video to an mp3 file for later offline playback hasn’t been easier these days with programs like youtube-dl and other alike. For example if you liked a music mix in youtube, lets say, a ‘syntwave mix ’ for your programming sessions and you have downloaded it with one the programs mentioned above, you now have a single mp3 file.

item.title: Binary theme switcher component
item.description: Introduction A lot of websites nowadays have this feature of having two color schemes for the user to choose, namely “dark” and “light”, implementing this is a peace of cake with the help of CSS custom properties (variables) and a bit of ECMAscript. Today I present you a web component that abstracts the ECMAscript part and lets you switch between the themes dynamically. Using the component is straightforward. The component adds and updates a data attribute “data-theme” to the body element which you can handle in CSS via attribute selectors, so depending on the theme you have you can update your theme variables.
